The .maf files in fixtures are selections from genuine MAF files
generated by the following awk scripts:

    awk 'BEGIN { n = 0 } { if ($1 != last) { n = n + 1; last = $1 } \
                         { if (n % 10 == 0) { print } } }' BRCA.maf > A.maf
    awk 'BEGIN { n = 0 } { if ($1 != last) { n = n + 1; last = $1 } \
                         { if (n % 10 == 0) { print } } }' OV.maf > B.maf
